question: The Latin word formica means ant. The name formic acid is derived from this Latin word because
option1: this acid, in ancient times, was used to eliminate ant-hills
option2: this corrosive acid is secreted by ants to drive away their enemies
option3: this acid was first obtained by the distillation of ants
option4: ants are attracted by the odour of this acid
answer: this acid was first obtained by the distillation of ants
